website_summaries.verdict: Velcro design makes this cheaper bed skirt easy to put on.
pros: A ruffled 100% polyester bed skirt with a wrap-around Velcro design
Elastic keeps the skirt in place, and the skirt has a 16-inch drop
cons: Some customers had trouble keeping the skirt in place without safety pins

customer_reviews.title: Truly does fit king and queen bed.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two this week, one for a king and one for a queen (size on package says fits king/queen). Was skeptical that it would work for both beds, but it truly fits each bed great. SOOO easy to put on. Not only did I leave mattress in place, but also left all bedding intact. I couldn’t be happier! Photo is on king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Great Dust Ruffle
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super easy to put on the bed. The large strap goes around the headboard and the ruffles are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is to put on
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in today. I love how easy it is to put on! I didn't realize until reading reviews that it is elastic the whole way around the box spring with no center. So much easier than a traditional bedskirt! I was concerned I might have trouble with it slipping but my box spring is short enough I was able to tuck the first round of elastic under the mattress so that shouldn't be a problem. The queen/king size fits our king bed perfectly. Ironing the bedskirt gave it a much more appealing appearance... I had my iron set very low to the silk setting.
customer_reviews.author: brivan

customer_reviews.title: ... skirt doesn’t stay put on the corners and it’s super saggy in the middle
customer_reviews.text: The elastic on this bed skirt doesn’t stay put on the corners and it’s super saggy in the middle! I was tired of always having to fix it so I took it off and threw it away and ordered a new one. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not like others I have had in the past where it ...
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to put on bed and no instructions. It is not like others I have had in the past where it is between the box spring and mattress it is like a rubber band that goes around the edge but doesn't stay on. Plus it does not have corners so it doesn't look right. Sadly I missed return window.
customer_reviews.author: Reader of Books

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install bed skirt.
customer_reviews.text: Have I been living under a rock?!?! I had no idea these bed skirts existed until searching Amazon and finding this. It was super easy to put on my king size bed. I have fought with bedskirts for years, breaking my neck to hold up half of the mattress while pushing the skirt through to the other side. At times, having to shove extra fabric back under the mattress to even out the bed skirt. This took me all of 2 minutes to put on. Amazing! Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: gross packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Package came delivered in a gross plastic container. As you can see in the photos, seems like there was tape that was ripped off only to have the sticky residue pick up dirt, dead bugs, and God knows what along the way. I thought, hm maybe the inside is salvageable, because I'm optimistic like that but NOPE! Without even opening the inside I see at the top touching the bed skirt a single grain of old rice. Disappointed and more so, grossed out!!!
customer_reviews.author: kyu

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Elastic Fails to Keep Product in Place When Installing or Making Bed
customer_reviews.text: The only time the product ever looked good was for the product photo. Elastic is not strong enough to keep sides from sagging. Washable? Hahaha. Better have a lingerie bag handy. I can only imagine how tight those flimsy elastic straps will get wound around the washing machine agitator. Difficult to install and keep from bunching up when making the bed. Returning mine today. Getting one that has a top that covers the box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kent P Steinnagel

customer_reviews.title: Game Changing
customer_reviews.text: Bedskirts are a nightmare. When I discovered this I was floored and had to share with my mother who was beside herself as we are season bedskirt warriors. I got the color black. My bed is a full but there was no listing for that size offered. I noticed from pictures posted by others, it looked like the skirt was stretched out so it didn’t have a flowy ruffled look for some. So I sized up to a queen and it did the trick(looks like the advertised picture). There was a slight sag in certain areas but that was fixed easily with bedskirt pins (they look like little corkscrews). Going to get a couple of these as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Yep

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I feel about this yet. Quality color etc all good. It is my first experience with this kind of bed skirt. It tends to be uneven in places and sags a bit in places. But I just tuck it back it in. I don’t know I guess it’s a personal preference thing. It’s a great skirt just not sure how I feel about the elastic design.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Three

customer_reviews.title: So Tedious!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst and most inconvenient bed skirt ever. It's SOOO tedious to put on and KEEP on. I'd say if this was used on a guest bed that never gets used then it's okay, but not for a bed you use everyday. We also have our box springs on the floor. We don't have a bed frame. I don't recommend this bedskirt if you don't have some sort of elevation off the floor. Also, the elastic tension makes it hard to keep in place. Just overall not a purchase I would ever make again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rolon

customer_reviews.title: Bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: This skirt is perfect went around my new king size bed that sits up high with no problem, the length almost hides the gap under the bed,I could bring it down more if I want it to touch the floor.(see last photo) I am So pleased with how bright white the skirt is, and goes perfect with my white quilt I purchased. I am so pleased with this skirt and will purchase again for my guest room bed. 😁💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about it was that it was easy to put on. It also comes off very easily. Too big for my queen would probably work for a king but I don't know. I don't have a king. Piece of junk and so sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Valorie Ockert

customer_reviews.title: Making the bed is no longer a chore
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe how easy it was to just lift this over the mattress and pull it down into place! The double elastic is a lifesaver. It adjusts so you can tuck it in more or pull it down. The color exactly matches my bedspread and was just like the online picture. I’d definitely buy it again. I just sprayed Downy wrinkle release on it, but you could toss it in the dryer on low too, to release the wrinkles just out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: bay area mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on 2 trundle beds that are together to form a king bed. I wanted to cover the metal frame underneath and a conventional duet ruffle would not work. this was perfect and very easy to install. It also was a little longer that a couple of others that I looked at. I threw it in the dryer to remove the wrinkles and it took about 5 minutes to put it on the bad. I only gave it a 4 star rating because of the quality of the fabric but I was using it in a guest room and it was just what I needed to cover the ugly frame. Also the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan's Sunny Days

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a nice color and texture. It is as described. My problem with this is the awkward fit. Size is spot on, but I prefer to have this coming out from between the mattress and box springs. Otherwise, it looks awkward just stapped on midway up the mattress, and has to be moved every time I wash the sheets. Just unusual. So, getting it to fit properly has been tricky with iffy, and inconsistent results. Still pretty, but not perfect. Most people investing in this are in it for the nice details, and finishing touch. Perfectionists beware. It will bug you (trust me)
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on, hard to adjust and keep adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I was conflicted wither to do four or three stars, but I gave this three stars because even though it is easy to get on, it is hard to adjust and keep adjusted, and I generally don't like poly anything. Otherwise, it is pretty much as shown and it really was easier to install than other kind that you have to move the mattress for, and cheaper than cotton.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this during a week that a lot of baby shower gifts were arriving in the mail, so it took way too long to figure out what happened (and now I'm out of the return window, of course). Although the plastic packaging sticker had the information for this product, what actually arrived was a weird cloth pouch with a zipper. I assumed this skirt had been opened by another family member and stored somewhere strange. I also assumed the weird pouch was an unrelated shower gift. Nope! Someone messed up with the labels. Now...off to figure out how to use my weird new bag. Bed still skirtless. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I hadn't purchased these bedskirts.
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike trying to move heavy foam mattresses and thought I would give this wrap-around bed skirt a try. It was so easy to put on the bed and looked so nice that I ordered 2 more. After just 3 months I am going to replace all of them. They do not stay in place and they sag terribly. They look so messy since they constantly shift, droop and drag on the floor. I do not want to spend time everyday tucking and straightening bed skirts so they look neat. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: glburk

customer_reviews.title: FOR A TWIN BED ONLY
customer_reviews.text: If you are wondering how a twin/full bedskirt can fit both sizes, the answer is it can't. For the price, the quality of both fabric and workmanship is exceptional. I am sure it would work well and gather beautifully on a twin bed. However, although this skirt will physically stretch enough to go around a full mattress, all gathers disappear, making the skirt look very skimpy and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but annoying when changing sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well-made product but I absolutely detest it and I'm donating it. It takes a lot longer to make up the bed with this style bed skirt. In my opinion, the old-fashioned kind that goes underneath the mattress is better. Since the product is very well-made, I'm not going to give it a low review, but if you're not a person that absolutely adores home decoration as a daily hobby, you're going to find a bed skirt annoying as anything when changing the sheets. I decided I don't care if I can see under the bed and I'll probably not use a bedskirt again of any sort cuz this one annoyed me so much. Life's too short.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Over joyed!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this bed skirt!!! Thank you, thank you, thank you!! I’ve been searching for a rustic bed skirt, and almost gave up trying to find one. I needed something long enough to cover the storage under our bed (we live in a tiny house, 400 sq ft.) I’m combining rustic with mid century modern, and this skirt was necessary to complete the look. Couldn’t be more happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: but like I said this was the only matching color
customer_reviews.text: This was the only skirt I could find that matched my bedding on amazon. I wasn't to fond of the ruffle, due to it being for my son's room, but like I said this was the only matching color. I've never used a skirt that wrapped around before, and it works, but I prefer a std. skirt. It seems like it will need readjusting more often. It has (2) elastic bands in the back to help secure to the box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri80

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After I read all the reviews, I decided on this one despite the wrinkle issues. I easily got rid of those with a damp towel and the skirt in the dryer for about 20 min. I am very pleased with it and it fits perfectly around my queen size mattress with 16' drop. Color is a nice navy blue and fabric sturdy. One of the best purchases as far as quality for a reasonable price. I definitely would recommend this if you are looking for a nice bed skirt. Can't comment on washing but i don't believe it will be a problem. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Goodytooshoes

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it seems like an easy solution when dealing with a king sized bed. However, I have a platform bed and there is no way to keep the bed skirt from popping off and firing under the mattress everytime I make the bed. Overall, im not satisfied. However, the cats are enjoying it every time I make the bed and attacking my feet. Therefore im giving it a mediocre review.
customer_reviews.author: laurel

customer_reviews.title: much better than traditional bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: Washed and dried this bedskirt right away to remove some of the wrinkles. Washed up well and was so easy to put on my bed! Looks so much nicer than my old one that was always crooked and impossible to adjust under the weight of my king mattress. Was worried this fabric might be shiny, but it's not. Looks very nice. My dog lays at the foot of my bed and gets dog hair all over the skirt, so I'm very excited to be able to slip this skirt off the bed and throw it in the wash when needed. So easy! Will be buying more for other beds.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Pops off and is difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt was incredibly difficult to get on. I had three other people holding the corners down and it still popped off. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Got the package, opened it, and put it on in less than 10 minutes!!!! So much better than the traditional that lays under the mattress!!!!! It was wrinkled but I just took it out of package. Easy to put on but I did have my dog assist by sitting on one side until I could get around bed 🤣🐶. Same as putting on fitted sheet. Fits my king well and like that I can pull it up since my comforter is a bit short. If you do have a footboard it does NOT have a split, but I think if you can sew it would be easy to cut and trim. So glad I bought it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So easy to get on!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is such a brilliant way to make a bed skirt! I like the look of bed skirts, but haven’t had one on my bed in a few years because they are such a pain! They move around when you change the bed and are a nightmare to get on, especially if you have a king size. This is super easy to put on. Stays in place pretty well. Fabric is thin, but I’m fine with that. The quality isn’t as good as one you’d buy at bed bath and beyond or something, but for the price and ease of use, it’s fantastic. I just love the engineering of this thing!
customer_reviews.author: jlms

customer_reviews.title: Queen size sags on sides, elastic not as right as described.
customer_reviews.text: The color looked very different in the picture than what I received. But for the price I decided to keep it instead of driving 45 minutes to return it. Have a queen, and it keeps sagging in the middle on the sides. Hiked in up in the back, and that seemed to help, but once the elastic stretches some I know I’ll need to pin it. Just wish the elastic was tighter all the way around. It keeps slipping down 🙁 on a king size, I don’t think this would be a problem, unless your box spring is slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but droops on a queen size
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this adds sophistication to the look of our room! The only downside is that it’s too large for our queen size bed and droops on the sides. It could be fixed by pinning but I can’t do that because I’m scared my baby will find a pin and get hurt. We’re getting a king size bed this week so hopefully it’ll be just perfect for that.
customer_reviews.author: Abesamis Family

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: For sure, this bed ruffle is a lot easier to apply than a traditional bed skirt. Does it stay in place and look great? Yes and no. At the head of the bed, I find I have to tug and pull it back to the right spot every time I make the bed. The elastic doesn’t stay where it should, and the ruffle doesn’t look right (just in the front). Once it is adjusted, it looks great; hangs well and is soft and not wrinkled. Color is vibrant and lovely, not dull.
customer_reviews.author: B3loyalist

customer_reviews.title: Love this 3 sided cover!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bed with drawers underneath, sometimes I just don't want to look at them. Then this came along!! I love it! I have a queen bed frame WTH an adjustable bed. I could fit this around my entire bed frame! It fits perfectly! I really can't say enough. It almost hits the floor but not completely which is good. Otherwise I would be stepping on it. It just gives my room a more mature look rather than the drawers showing. I want on in every color now. Great buy!😀
customer_reviews.author: Christina Primazon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing in the middle... black fabric skirt only?
customer_reviews.text: In the pictures, it looks like there’s a bit of white fabric that goes over the box frame... but there’s not. It’s literally just the black material with two elastic bands. Thankfully, it works for me because I have a platform frame and the two elastic straps are spaced just right to hug around the metal frame... but if you’re expecting it to be a full sheet sort of thing to cover a box frame... it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN R

customer_reviews.title: A tu-tu skirt lol!
customer_reviews.text: I received it pretty fast... due to all this happening right now, I was expecting the entire thing to be able to put it just like my sheets,but this is just the skirt and elastic that will hold on to the bottom mattress. Fit great, something new...make sure u get the actual size because it's just the skirt around it and the elastic on one side like a tu-tu lol...but for your bed. It covers nicely too. It was wrinkled but I can definitely put in dryer and fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Paula lara

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bed skirt with a 12" drop since I have a low profile box spring. They are hard to find but saw this one and because I didn't have to remove the mattress to put it on, I was interested. However, it says it has a 16" drop so I figured it wouldn't fit .. until I asked a question and a few customers told me it WOULD fit and they were correct. I thank them. It fits just fine, is a bit wrinkled but I'm very pleased and you can't go wrong with the value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLou

customer_reviews.title: It Fits Adjustable King Size Beds!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go over our split king adjustable bed--ironed it on low and it fit perfectly. Now, you can't see under the bed and it compliments the quilt I use. Good value and love the gray color.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: They need to have a slit to lay better with a footboard
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these bed skirts. I love the idea the mattress does not need to be lifted to install the bed skirt. I have other bed skirts and they have a slit at the bottom corners so it lays better with a footboard. It still works but would be a better fit with a slit. They are wrinkled when they arrive, I just put them in the dryer with a wet towel and the wrinkles come out. If they redesign with a slit, I will give a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: vbnita

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen/king size intending to use it on a split king adjustable base set. I added the fabric pins for a few dollars and voila, I now have a perfect skirt that stays put and returns to the proper positions after I have raised the head and feet on each side seperately. It fits great and by using pins on each corner and the the movement points it's perfect. I couldn't be happier with my purchase! On a side note, It does arrive folded and will need to be steamed or thrown in the dryer for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a skirt that would fit a king-size bed and one that I could manage putting on by myself. This skirt was exactly what I was looking for. It went on easy, any wrinkles from packaging came out within a couple of days of putting it on the bed. The color was as described. There are two rows of elastic so depending on the length you need you can adjust. Only thing is that when you change your sheets it does tend to slip so you will need to readjust.
customer_reviews.author: BeachNY

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedskirt! It’s so easy to put on and makes a huge difference in the aesthetics of our bedroom. I did wash it when it arrived to get the wrinkles out, but after that it was wrinkle free. This one reaches all the way to the floor & is able to cover the whole box spring and bed frame which is just what I wanted. I definitely recommend this bedskirt if you’re looking for an easy, inexpensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest bed skirt I have ever used. It literally took two minutes on a king-sized bed with no mattress lifting. You simply pull it down over the mattress. No skirting on one edge, which goes at the top, so no trying to figure out which is a side or top or bottom. Slide it on and done! Adjust if you want it longer or shorter with a simple tug. The only small detail is that I would prefer a sharper, straight edge as opposed to a draped, flouncy look - but it really is nice and completes the bed.
customer_reviews.author: lip balm addict

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful not to have to lift a mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these bedskirts. Whether you are using them with a traditional box spring or a metal frame, they stay in place and are easy to put on the bed. The double elastic at the top allows the bedskirt to rest between metal frames, so they are even more secure than with a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Worked with adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed skirt that could work with an adjustable bed and one that did not lay over the box spring like a sheet. This bed skirt worked perfect on my adjustable king size bed. It was easy to put on with no assistance. It goes around the box and fits snugly so no sagging. You can tuck it under the mattress as well. The fit was great and the length was perfect. It goes from the top of the adjustable platform and just hits the floor nicely. Great buy for the price. I am going to buy another one for daughters bed.
customer_reviews.author: TeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of my ugly box spring poking out from under my mattress. I bought this little skirt and it dramatically improved the appearance of my bed. I will say it is a bit of a pain to install and makes changing your sheets and making your bed more of a hassle. Sometimes one of the elastics will come up over the box spring and slip between the mattress and box spring. But if you have an ugly box spring and want to hide it, this is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Paule P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, easy to install and works with adjustable bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt is working great! I got one before in a store, but I was disappointed with the design and appearance. So I researched Amazon and gave a try to this item. Everything is true that the manufacturer said about it: well priced, very easy to install, looks pretty, works with my adjustable base bed and it doesn’t need ironing! I washed it before using it, and all the original wrinkles disappeared! I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: hunamer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is awesome. Looks just like picture and so easy use! It does not arrive wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. Super soft. But it is super wrinkled when it arrives,,,,BUT...I liked it that way. Gives it a bit of shabby chic look. I have the dark grey so it doesn't show so badly. My guess is, if it is washed and you place around bed when still warm from dryer that it will likely be wrinkle free. Either way, I am super happy with this! Could not give it 5 stars since its claim to be wrinkle free is not entirely true upon arrival. If you use it before washing and you want a tailored look you will want to iron it. But worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: I have a Purple mattress and metal bed frame. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Purple mattress and metal bed frame. That mattress weighs about the same as an adolescent elephant, so getting a bedskirt on is a pain in the... elephant. This bed skirt, after a quick de-wrinkle in the dryer, went on the bed in about 5 minutes total with no rasslin' needed. I can't speak to any transparency issues, since I didn't take the old skirt off first. Not quite ready for that hassle again. (Love the Purple mattress, though.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation.
customer_reviews.text: I ran the skirt thru a rinse cycle and dried at low heat and it came out very nice, no need to iron. The elastic could be a little stronger. It has a tendency to droop when you are making the bed daily. The good news is that it is easy to just pull it up a little. I would buy again, definitely easier than taking the mattress off and putting the skirt between mattress and box springs.
customer_reviews.author: Monte M.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I first got on for my daughter room, and full size bed to see if they really worked and stayed in place,, They do, and so easy it is the best. Put one on my king size bed in under a minute.. no more lifting the mattress, sheets ect.. perfect.
customer_reviews.author: karla402

customer_reviews.title: Nice skirt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and easy installation. Nice material for price. I also like that you can kind of adjust the height of it, if you want some of the skirt on the floor for the more rustic look, or higher up.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy agin. It doesn’t stay in place while making the bed. Slips off every time I try to tuck a sheet under the mattress. If you’re looking to quickly make your bed, I wouldn’t recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed Skirt with a good look and great value
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is a very good value, with great look. This is strictly a bed skirt with two straps for the head of the skirt (others have a white fabric that fits between the box and mattress......this does not). So it takes a bit of work to initially fit it onto the bed. But once adjusted this has a better look (i.e. no white fabric sowing through). Very happy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: jaydenmo

customer_reviews.title: Wrap around style does not stay in place for me.
customer_reviews.text: These wraparound style bed skirts just do not work for me. The elastic is very easy to put on the bed but it does not stay in place. It snaps up or sags down exposing the mattress layers I am trying to camouflage. This particular one is also cheap looking and thin. Not luxurious in any way. But it was cheap so I am not surprised. I did think it would stay in place so I was ok with it not being fancy looking. I will not buy a wrap around bed skirt again.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: No hassle! Washed first and left in dryer (dried) for a day. No wrinkles! No pulling the mattress off to use! Elastic is good quality and it went on so easy. Love that there is a side left without fabric so it lays flat and no need to try and fit around the back of the bed. Elastic also keeps the open side secure. Easy to adjust length and ruffles are perfect. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: luvyurnurse

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed skirt and found this one the exact color I needed. I was skeptical but was impressed by the quality of the material. The skirt fabric was nice and the color was what I was looking for. The elastic is not great only because you don't get the toughness you need to ensure it stays in place but it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LYDIA

customer_reviews.title: Finally One That WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a bedskirt that would fit well without that horrid top panel that is impossible to install under a heavy king mattress. I've ordered several that didn't work, but this one was easy to slip on. It doesn't interfere with sheets or comforters. It did arrive very wrinkled, so now that I've tried it, I will try getting the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I hate bedskirts, period. However, we were putting our house on market and staging so I needed one. With prior attempts to use one, the skirt was always crooked or too short or just ugly. This one was SO easy to put on and hung very nicely. I did use little tapestry pins or whatever they are called to secure it in places just to make sure it didn't move. It was a little wrinkled when I opened package, but that is to be expected. The wrinkles have released somewhat in the week that it has been on the bed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L&K D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute simple bed skirt. I love the wrap around idea, it’s brilliant. So easy. It does sag in the middle, so you either have to constantly tuck the top in under the mattress, or get some pins to keep it in place (not a big deal). The corners stay put just fine. Came really wrinkled from shipping - just throw it in the dryer with a wet rag for 20 minutes and they steam right out. Makes for a significantly nicer look.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 12" bed skirt. Couldn't find one. I read reviews on this one that said it's somewhat adjustable. And it WORKED!! It's been on for a week now and it stays in place, mostly. but if it really bothers someone I'm sure you could just put it in place. It was a little wrinkled but a quick ironing took care of that. Also, it's super easy to put on!! No need to remove the mattress!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for the price. Haven’t washed it yet, so we’ll see about the wash-ability, but it works on the bed as advertised. Bought for a kid’s room and we have two cats who hang out in that room often. So far, it’s been easy to get this skirt de-cat-haired by vacuum or lint rolling. My kid loved that this skirt is easy to put on and asked me to get another one for her college apartment next year. The color is true-to image. Nice item, overall.
customer_reviews.author: wordweaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, but had to iron
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on. Much better than the other type that don't always quite fit. You can make easy adjustments in the length with a little tug, yet they stay in place decently. I had to iron them, but they look really nice now. On the thin side, but for a rental condo it makes the beds look finished and reasonably priced. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It is very SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I just quickly tried it on my bed to see if it would fit and it does. I didn't even take off the bedspread . I am washing it now in cold water and I will line dry it. I will also iron it I always iron my skirting . I like this because I don't have to take my mattress off to put it on . I am very happy with the skirting . Great product for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Stay Put
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this, but it’s not as effective in execution. First, it’s easy for things to slide between the bedskirt and the bed, and you can pull the bedskirt as a result. Also, it creeps up a lot, sliding partly under/between the bed. This product is what it is, but this design is not as effective as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use,  fits California king but.....
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on, fits my bed nicely, hangs down low to the ground, nice quality material, great color but I find myself tripping on it much more than a traditional bed skirt & my kids think it's a pretty cool sling shot, so the elastic band has its downsides that's why is a 4 out of 5 star
customer_reviews.author: family of 8

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: The light weight fabric was a little wrinkled out of the package. You can see that at the foot in the photo I took right after making the bed. It has smoothed out since then. Not iron perfect, but if someone notices, they are looking too closely. I very much like that we didn't have to remove the mattress to install this bed skirt. The triple elastic top made it quite easy with hubby's help. I will never buy a traditional style bed skirt again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on !
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt was super easy to put on. The only complaint I would have is the color was off. Instead of being a warm chocolate brown,it was more of a cool brown. It was very wrinkly ,but I plan to cut slits in it for the legs of my bed to allow it to hang properly. I'll iron it after I hem the slits. All in all its a nice bed skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H Falls

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this bed skirt doesn't involve lifting up a mattress cause that's no fun. I knocked a star off because I do have to frequently rearrange the skirt as it shifts whenever I make the bed or if my foot gets caught up in it. The skirt would be much better with a tighter elastic all the way around. Despite that, I'd order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great product  but very thin material
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of these. It's elastic all the way around with fabric on 3 sides. Easy to put on a bed but I ordered the white and it is almost see through. I can faintly see the storage bins under my bed through them. The material is too thin. Disappointed and will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Cletg

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Bed Skirt install of my life
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived next day. Wrinkled out of package, 10 min in dryer & it looks perfect, no iron needed. I watched the install video but didn't want to take the mattress off the queen sleigh bed. I installed it by untucking the foot of the top sheet & comforter only. I stretched the elastic at the head. Secured the two corners at the head of the bed with upholstery pins, then worked my way to the foot on each side securing with 1 hook in the middle and 1 at the foot of each side. Easy 15 min job, looks perfect and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best bed skirt ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the design of this and its exactly what my bed needed. My bed has a metal bar at the foot of the frame to keep the mattress from sliding off (its one of those ones you can elevate the foot or head), so a standard bed skirt doesn't work with it because of that bar. This bed skirt though, perfect solution! So happy I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good idea. My regular skirts always ripped under my matress, this just flops and stretches so it doesn’t take any damage. You don’t have to disassemble your entIre bed just to clean the bedclothes, and it snaps right on and off when you’re done, and no one can tell it’s any different from a nice fancy bedskirt. It looks nice with my bedclothes and it’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: jessi & sky

customer_reviews.title: Great Item...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a difference! I had fought with dust ruffles & bed skirts all my adult life. This design is so easy to put around my bed. This item is exactly as listed. Good quality fabric that drapes nicely and is not see through. It has just enough ruffle effect to be pretty but overly full. Thanks for making this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marion

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt was absolutely wonderful. I was a little leery when I ordered it, because I was used to the old type of bed skirts. The kind that go between the mattress & box spring. This was wonderful. So easy to put on. I am older and I did it within minutes. I loved it and it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: linda miller

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying another bed skirt because one I ordered from another seller looked very cheap, see-through and didn't fit well when I put it on my bed. This one is perfect! I bought the white one. It took about 20 seconds to put on... no issues at all. You can see through it a little bit, but not bad. It hangs perfectly and ruffles right where I want it to. I was also worried about it fitting too "straight" instead of ruffling since I have a king size bed. I would definitely recommend this product to others which is why I took the time to write a great review.
customer_reviews.author: Medina McKellar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a queen bed my granddaughter sleeps in. Much easier to install than having to remove the mattress with the old style bedskirt. Can't speak for ease of cleaning, as has only been in place for a few weeks. Is adequately long to almost reach the floor, which is what we wanted. Granddaughter wanted to hide the bins she has stored under her bed. Fabric seems relatively durable given the cost of the product. Design is well thought out too.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy Set Up GREAT Product!
customer_reviews.text: I only just purchased this item. I was hesitant to buy it due to the sizing being King and Queen since I have a Queen. However, it isn't too big and fits just as I needed it to. I was able to put it on by myself in less than 5 minutes. The fabric was wrinkled some from being in the package but it came right out after being in the dryer with a wet rag for about 15 minutes. I'd definitely buy this again, and I don't say that often.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on the bed.
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt was very easy to put on and really made the bed look more finished. It sometimes rides up in places and I have to straighten it, but the elastic design makes this easy to do. I will definitely buy this bed skirt again if adding a skirt to another bed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Make your life easier
customer_reviews.text: It was always such a pain when I needed to wash my bed skirt. So I rarely did. This skirt is so easy to use. No wrinkles, even though that wasn’t big concern... removed my filthy old one, and put this one by myself. So easy. I’m that person that changes her duvet/comforter seasonally, so I’ll be ordering more colors. Wish I’d know about these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: megan golla

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have a king size memory foam mattress, that sits on a platform frame. The mattress is incredibly heavy and near impossible for me to maneuver to get a standard skirt on our bed, especially with all of the gaps and groves of the metal platform frame, our mattress sits on. The answer to my problem, was a wrap around skirt. I love this thing. It was very easy to do. I was able to put it on our king bed by myself. Which took me maybe ten seconds to do. My only issue is it does slide down. But I purchased some bedskirt push pins and that holds the skirt in place.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and one person can install/get into place!!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! What an awesome invention! Trying to place a king dust ruffle on a king bed is pretty much almost impossible but not with this type of ruffle. Well- made and took seconds to install and only takes one person to get into place which is amazing! Nice fabric, nice color and shipped quickly and on time. Of course their were wrinkles but I just dampened the material and tossed it in the Dyer. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperGal

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, i was skeptical. We have an adjustable bed and i needed a bedskirt that would stay put when we move the bed. It did! When we recieved it, i did have to iron it because it was very wrinkled. The instructions say not to, but i put a dishtowel over it and, for me, that worked well. I think this product is a good value and did what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Skirting
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. You cannot beat the ease and the price point of this product. It has the ability to adjust the height from the floor, it flows nicely and not stiff. The fabric was easily steamed to get rid of the wrinkles. I would highly recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my bed, and loved them so much that I bought them for my daughter’s bed as well. I’m 9 months pregnant and cannot move my mattress just so that I can put on a bed skirt. In fact, it is a pain in the butt even if I’m not pregnant, and these are such a simple solution to this! They look fantastic and really add that finishing touch to her room!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I definitely did not think the quality would be as good as it is. I bought it just to cover box spring but since her bed has footboard and rails the sides bunch up because it one piece that wraps around mattress. However i am using it for my mattress and material is stretch, durable and feels great! Definitely not cheaply made and would definitely recommend and re-purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chuly Snakis❤️🍷

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedskirt!!!! I have a bad back and was not looking forward to changing the bedskirt out as it’s a struggle w the bad back, and even more so doing it alone, but this came w a hollow middle. Basically stretched it over the mattress, and it was a breeze! Took me less than 5 mins and didn’t even have to remake the bed!!! Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Best bed skirt ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent idea for a bedskirt! I can’t install the old type without another person to help, but installing the wrap around is super easy. It took me about 60 seconds to put this on my bed and looks wonderful. I thought it might be a pain when making the bed or changing sheets but it is not. I would not hesitate to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Lair

customer_reviews.title: No more heavy lifting of the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I did not dislike this product. The previous bed skirts required lifting the mattress which means it becomes a two persons job...this bed skirt is awesome as it borders the bed and does not require you to lift the mattress at all. The bands look durable and I would not clean it unless it is highly necessary.
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: Great bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed skirt! It was very easy to put around my bed. I love how you can easily remove or put on without having to move your top mattress. It was very wrinkled out the package so I spent a good 30+ minutes steam ironing it.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous victorian style
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to wash and put onto bed. Looks great. If anything, I wish they made more specific sizes so that you can control more or less ruffle. My bedroom is an 1800s theme, so I'd prefer MORE RUFFLES! But it's still great and goes over my adjustable bed base yet under my wooden bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Amadei

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love how it actually fits the box spring like a skirt! My previous bed skirt laid over the top of the box and would always get messed up and misaligned so I was constantly taking the whole bed apart. This one hasn’t moved at all and looks so nice. It’s definitely wrinkled but I like that look.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Fetters

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the full bed ruffle
customer_reviews.text: The elastic band doesn't stay where you put it. It wants to pull up between the mattress and box. I think if the bottom elastic band (not the top elastic band) was tighter it would stay in place better Once the top band slides, it takes the other band with it. It's a pretty ruffle, just a bit irritating. The full bed ruffle is a pain to put on and take off because you have to remove the mattress, but once that chore is over, the ruffle stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wige

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple months and even though I love it and the only thing that bothers me is on one edge it slips up between my mattress and box spring very easy to put back down no real issue just wanted to let any one know just in case that would bother them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt does not allow one to make up the bed easily without snapping back into the mattress. I tried using it....but stuffed it into a Goodwill bag and got rid of it instead. I bought one that covered the entire boxsprings and could easily make up the bed then. Don't bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Dora

customer_reviews.title: What took so long to make this!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in blue, washed and low dried and it is now on my bed!! OMG I love it. I’m older and alone so never thought I could get a bed skirt with no one to help lift mattress but this really only took 4 minutes to put on. For anyone who wants to change your bedding you can buy in any color to match comforter without waiting for someone to help. Yeah!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love this dust ruffle. Altho I need to iron out creases from packaging, it is so easy to apply without all the hassle of putting it on the entire boxsprings and the trying to get the mattress on it and keep it straight. The price is wondrous for such an easy product. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH MCCORKLE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep the dust at bay from underneath my bed. It was very easy to put on and stays in place quite well. I haven't checked out the dust situation yet though. (let sleeping dust lay) The only thing more I could want is a color closer to my bedspread. But it works!
customer_reviews.author: X. Winters

customer_reviews.title: Not Practical
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is a terrible idea. Seems easy to use and whatnot but it slides around and falls off all the time. Looks bad, I already donated it to goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers I have to ask myself. Why did I take so long to get one of these? It goes on and off easily. If you have tho old kind where you have to move the mattress to put it on, then get rid of it and buy this instead! Mine looked good right out to the package.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Sense

customer_reviews.title: Bed ruffle looks very pretty, used it as an "underskirt" for a tulle overlay
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ruffle, not quite as thin as some I have seen, and it did fit suit our purpose as an underskirt for glimmer tulle and it fit her bed well, with the exception that on the frame we are using (metal) the ruffle kept slipping off; we tried double-sided adhesive velcro, but it came off again anyway, so at this point she just tucks the ruffle between the mattress and the bedframe so that it stays put. Wrinkles came out quickly with a quick trip in the dryer with a damp (non-linty) towel.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kress

product_meta.title: MEILA Bed Skirt Three Fabric Sides Elastic Wrap Around Dust Ruffled Solid Bed Skirts Easy On/Easy Off 16 Inch Tailored Drop, Black, Twin/Full
feature_bullets: Twin/Full Size: Suitable for Twin beds (39x 75in), XL Twin beds (39x 80in) and Full beds (54x 75in)
Smooth microfiber polyester fabric, Fade Resistant, More durable than cotton
Smartly designed with one elastic side and three fabric sides.Adjustable elastic band makes it so easy to put on and take off your bed, that you won't even need to lift the mattress
Suitable for most Types of Beds: Conceals any frames, box springs, platforms, mattresses or underneath storage (But not suitable for beds with footboard or posts)
Machine wash, cold gentle cycle, do not bleach; if possible buyer can wash it and steam it (used a steam iron on a low setting ) before the first use, it will looks more beautiful.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,634 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
